charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a), 2113(d) BANK ROBBERY AND 18:2 AIDING AND ABETTING(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 36 months. Upon release from imprisonment she shall be placed on supervised release for a period of 2 years. No Fine. Special Assessment in the amount of $100 due within 14 days of the entry of judgment. Restitution in the amount of $14,533.00 is hereby imposed.
